```{r}
library('DEoptimR')

Schwefel_222= function(x)
  {
  Num=length(x)
  sumx=0
  prodx=1

	for (i in 1:Num)
	  {
    sumx=sumx+abs(x[i])
    prodx=prodx*abs(x[i])
		}
	fun=sumx+prodx
  return(fun)
  }
# f(x)=0 x=(0,0) [âˆ’10, 10]

dim=30
RUNS=50
ITE=2000
NPAR=100
Bounds=10
Y=0;X=0
for(i in 1:RUNS)
  {
  JDE_R=JDEoptim(rep(-Bounds, dim), rep(Bounds, dim), Schwefel_222,
         tol = 1e-100,NP=NPAR, trace = FALSE,  maxiter =ITE)
  Y[i]=JDE_R$value
  }
MEAN=mean(Y)
STD=sd(Y)
MAX=max(Y)
MIN=min(Y)
cat('Schwefel_222 JDE DIM=',dim,'RUNS=',RUNS,'ITE=',ITE,'Bounds=',Bounds,Bounds,'\n')
cat('MEAN=',MEAN,'\n')
cat('MAX',MAX,'\n')
cat('MIN=',MIN,'\n')
cat('STD',STD,'\n')
